name: 3D Fight Arena TV Box Game
description:
Are you brave enough to enter the world of 3D Fight Arena? 

At night the strong villains wander around, so the does the city heroes.

Fight to protect your city at any cost within this graphically amazing 3D Fight Arena TV Box Game. 

Make use of various fighting technics to defeat the enemy in this 3D Fighting game playable on mobile devices and TV Box with TV Remote.
